Sentencas: As an extended-range electric vehicle energy supply technology with high efficiency, solid oxide fuel cell thermoelectric surge has a negative impact on power stable output and energy conversion efficiency of vehicle during the dynamic process.
Titulo: Extended-range electric vehicle-oriented thermoelectric surge control of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: In this paper, a black box mathematical model is identified using a kW-scale SOFC system with a reformer.
Titulo: Extended-range electric vehicle-oriented thermoelectric surge control of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: This model includes the dynamic characteristics of key components (BOP) such as the stack, reformer, heat exchanger, and afterburner.
Titulo: Extended-range electric vehicle-oriented thermoelectric surge control of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Then, the model is simplified effectively to 7 input x 3 output mode.
Titulo: Extended-range electric vehicle-oriented thermoelectric surge control of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Compared with the actual SOFC system, the model identification accuracy is 86%, which takes 3.78s.
Titulo: Extended-range electric vehicle-oriented thermoelectric surge control of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Further, the system model and data are used to analyze the balance of plant response.
Titulo: Extended-range electric vehicle-oriented thermoelectric surge control of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: It is found that the system thermoelectric safety is closely related with the steam to carbon ratio.
Titulo: Extended-range electric vehicle-oriented thermoelectric surge control of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Based on the analysis results of thermoelectric surge phenomenon, a data-driven predictive control strategy is developed to guarantee the system thermal safety and steady power generation by the cooperative control of fuel and air flow rate.
Titulo: Extended-range electric vehicle-oriented thermoelectric surge control of a solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The test results show that the proposed predictive controller solves effectively the system thermoelectric surge problem, and improve the energy conversion efficiency for extended-range electric vehicle.
Titulo: Extended-range electric vehicle-oriented thermoelectric surge control of a solid oxide fuel cell system
